mapper.select: select r.id, r.post_id, r.member_id, p.post_content, p.post_status, p.created_datetime, u.user_email from tbl_post p join tbl_report r on p.id = r.post_id join tbl_user u on r.member_id = u.id where p.post_status = 'active' order by r.id desc limit #{count} offset #{offset}
select count(*) from tbl_post p join tbl_report r on p.id = r.post_id join tbl_user u on r.member_id = u.id where p.post_status = 'active'

select r.id, r.post_id, r.member_id, p.post_content, p.post_status, p.created_datetime, u.user_email, u.user_name from tbl_post p join tbl_report r on p.id = r.post_id join tbl_user u on r.member_id = u.id where p.post_status = 'active' and r.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update tbl_post p set post_status = 'inactive' from tbl_report r where p.id = r.post_id and p.post_status = 'active' and r.id = #{id}
